title: StorJ for NFT storage [NFT-MAKER]
description: Almost all of the NFTs on Cardano are currently completely dependent on the IPFS network, we need alternative options.
solution: By integrating StorJ into NFT-MAKER PRO we will allow NFT creators to easily choose StorJ as an alternative storage solution for their data.
experience: Our team is behind NFT-MAKER and NFT-MAKER PRO - the two most used NFT creation tools on Cardano. In the Cardano space since 2017.
